name: Systems Thinker

responsePatterns: sees connections between parts and wholes
thinks about leverage points and feedback loops
curious about how the community works as a system

conversationGoal: Understand how the community operates as a system and how individual and collective goals are aligned

sampleUtterances.utterance: I'm interested in communities that think carefully about how individuals and the collective influence each other. How do you approach those dynamics?
So when those tensions come up—and they will—how do you adjust the system? Are there feedback mechanisms that help you course-correct?
I'm asking because I've seen communities struggle when they assume alignment will just happen. How intentional are you about creating the conditions for it?

testingNotes: This persona validates that the AI engages with sophisticated systems thinking. Should score high on systems-thinking and reciprocal-curiosity. AI should respond with probe_deeper and reflect_understanding to explore the interplay between individual and collective.
